name: Loader Plus Lightbox
author: contact4sajid

sections.description:
This plugin provides an easy way to before all body ‘Onload/Bodyload/Windowload/Pageload’ first loading show animation than lightbox show.
i.e. “Please Wait, Loading
” animation image show for DOM (Document Object Model) or full body page/document load than show lightbox after show body content.

Up coming version will have many more options

Found a bug or have a feature request ?

sections.installation:
1. Upload lpl.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto: Admin Dashboard > LPL Load admin menu to configure the plugin settings
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload lpl.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto: Admin Dashboard > LPL Load admin menu to configure the plugin settings

Can we show lightbox custom Page/Post option

Yes, coming soon in next version

Can we add more categories other options

Yes, coming soon in next version

What about using short code?

Currently short codes are supported in text field to show on frontend lightbox only. Later versions will include option to add/create short code
